document_data.name: Wolf Knight
document_data.mainbody: The '''Wolf Knight''' was brigand who once ruled over the [[Keep of the Far Hills]] in the [[Western Heartlands]].
document_data.History:
Once a follower of [[Angarn Surfyst]], Wolf Knight betrayed and slew the bandit leader, before seizing the [[Far Hills]]' fortress as his own. Unfortunately for the unnamed lord, his tenure as ruler of the keep was short-lived.

The Wolf Knight was himself killed by the [[sorceress]] [[Sarunn Thoon]], who posed as a timid captive and prospective lover.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Although his name was lost to the ages, the Wolf Knight appeared as part of Sarunn's tale, as immortalized in ''[[The Witch of the Far Cold Hill]]''.
